nodes.text: The Vulture's Claw was a GS-100 salvage ship owned by the Trandoshan scavenger Gha Nachkt. Following the Battle of Bothawui, Nachkt scavenged Jedi Knight Anakin Skywalker's astromech droid, R2-D2, from the debris and stored him aboard the Vulture's Claw.
The ship was dirty and had an unpleasant smell. It featured a large hold filled with containers from various salvages as well as multiple IG-86 sentinel droids.
